mutation {
	createDataproduct(
		input: {
			name: "NewName"
			description: "New description"
			group: "team@nav.no"
            teamContact: "#team"
			datasets: [{
                name: "DatasetCreatedWithDataproduct"
                description: "dataset created with dataproduct"
			    pii: none
			    bigquery: { projectID: "team-dev-1337", dataset: "dataset", table: "table1" }
                repo: "somerepo"
                keywords: ["keyword1", "otherkeyword"]
            }]
		}
	) {
		id
	}
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.createDataproduct.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS
{
  "data": {
    "createDataproduct": {
    }
  }
}
